
namespace = modern_ship_missil_10

country_event = {
	id = modern_ship_missil_10.9
	title = modern_missil.9.t
	desc = modern_missil.9.d
	picture = target_ship_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes
	

	option = { #Cancel
		name = modern_missil.9.a		
		country_event = {
			id = modern_ship_missil_10.1
		}
	}
	option = { #Cancel
		name = modern_missil.1.cansel
		clr_global_flag = misile_ship_flag
		clear_global_event_target = missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = modern_ship_missil_10.1
	title = modern_ship_missil.1.t
	desc = modern_ship_missil.1.d
	picture = target_ship_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { #heavy ship
		name = modern_ship_missil.heavyship.1
		trigger = {
			event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
				sea_superregion = {
					any_province = {
						country_or_subject_holds = root
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							province_distance = {
								who = prev
								distance = 100
							}
						}
					}
					heavy_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
				}
			}
		}		
		country_event = {
			id = modern_ship_missil_10.5
		}
		
	}
	option = { #heavy ship
		name = modern_ship_missil.galley.1
		trigger = {
			event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
				sea_superregion = {
					any_province = {
						country_or_subject_holds = root
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							province_distance = {
								who = prev
								distance = 100
							}
						}
					}
					galleys_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
				}
			}
		}		
		country_event = {
			id = modern_ship_missil_10.2
		}
		
	}
	option = { #transport
		name = modern_ship_missil.tradeship.1
		trigger = {
			event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
				sea_superregion = {
					any_province = {
						country_or_subject_holds = root
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							province_distance = {
								who = prev
								distance = 100
							}
						}
					}
					light_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
				}
			}
		}		
		country_event = {
			id = modern_ship_missil_10.3
		}
		
	}
	option = { #Major City
		name = modern_ship_missil.transporter.1
		trigger = { 
			event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
				sea_superregion = {
					any_province = {
						country_or_subject_holds = root
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							province_distance = {
								who = prev
								distance = 100
							}
						}
					}
					transports_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
				}
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = modern_ship_missil_10.4
		}
		
	}
	
	option = { #Cancel
		name = modern_missil.1.cansel
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = modern_ship_missil_10.5
	title = modern_ship_missil.heavy_ship.t
	desc = modern_ship_missil.heavy_ship.d
	picture = aircraft_carrier_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes

	
	option = { #500 Km
		name = modern_ship_missil.heavy_ship.a50
		trigger = { 
			check_variable = {
				which = missil_50
				value = 10
			}
				event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
					sea_superregion = {
						any_province = {
							country_or_subject_holds = root
							has_building = mass_transit_system
							OR = {
								controlled_by = root
								controller = {
									is_subject_of = root
								}
							}
							NOT = {
								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 50
								}
							}
						}
						heavy_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
					}
				}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = { 
						
						OR = {
							AND = {	
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 1
									}
								
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 2
									}
								}
								
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 2
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 2
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 3
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 3
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 3
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 4
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 4
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 4
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 5
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 5
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 5
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 6
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 6
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 6
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 7
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 7
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 7
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 8
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 8
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 8
								}

							which = missil_50
							value = 10
						}
						
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
						sea_superregion = {
							any_province = {
								country_or_subject_holds = root
								has_building = mass_transit_system
								OR = {
									controlled_by = root
									controller = {
										is_subject_of = root
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									province_distance = {
										who = prev
										distance = 50
									}
								}
							}
							OR = {
								heavy_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
								galleys_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
							}
						}
					}
				}			
				random_province = {
					limit = {
						sea_superregion = {	
							heavy_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
							
							NOT = {
								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 50
								}
							}
						}

							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}

						country_event = {
							id = they_cant_set_atom.6
						}
					}
				}
				event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
					change_variable = {
						which = missil_50
						value = -10
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = missil_50
					value = -10
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = modern_ship_missil_10.9
				}

					set_variable = {
						which = missil_50
						value = 0
					}
					sea_superregion = {
						limit = {
							any_province = {
								country_or_subject_holds = root

									controlled_by = root
									controller = {
										is_subject_of = root
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									province_distance = {
										who = prev
										distance = 50
									}
								}
							}
							heavy_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
						}
						kill_units = { who = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country type = heavy_ship amount = 2 }
					}
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = missile_our_ship_h
					}
				}
				random_province = {
					limit = {
						sea_superregion = {

							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 82
								}

									}

											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 101
										}
									}

							}
						}
					}
					OR = {
						event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = { 
							full_idea_group = defence_missil_research
						}
						event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
							overlord = { 
								full_idea_group = defence_missil_research
							}
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = { 
						check_variable = {
							which = missil_100
							value = 10
						}
						
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
						sea_superregion = {
							any_province = {
								country_or_subject_holds = root
								has_building = mass_transit_system
								OR = {
									controlled_by = root
									controller = {
										is_subject_of = root
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									province_distance = {
										who = prev
										distance = 100
									}
								}
							}
							OR = {
								heavy_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
								galleys_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
							}
						}
					}
				}			
				random_province = {
					limit = {
						sea_superregion = {	
							heavy_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
							
							NOT = {
								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 100
								}
							}
						}
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
						country_event = {
							id = they_cant_set_atom.6
						}
					}
				}
				event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
					change_variable = {
						which = missil_50
						value = -10
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = missil_100
					value = -10
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = modern_ship_missil_10.9
				}
				event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
					set_variable = {
						which = missil_50
						value = 0
					}
					sea_superregion = {
						limit = {
							any_province = {
								country_or_subject_holds = root
								has_building = mass_transit_system
								OR = {
									controlled_by = root
									controller = {
										is_subject_of = root
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									province_distance = {
										who = prev
										distance = 100
									}
								}
							}
							heavy_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
						}
						kill_units = { who = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country type = heavy_ship amount = 2 }	
					}
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = missile_our_ship_h
					}
				}
				random_province = {
					limit = {
						sea_superregion = {	
							heavy_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
							
							NOT = {
								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 100
								}
							}
						}
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
						country_event = {
							id = they_cant_set_atom.70
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = missil_100
					value = -10
				}
			}
		}
		
	}

	option = { #Cancel
		name = modern_missil.1.cansel
		clr_global_flag = misile_ship_flag
		clear_global_event_target = missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = modern_ship_missil_10.2
	title = modern_ship_missil.galley.t
	desc = modern_ship_missil.galley.d
	picture = war_ship_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes

	
	option = { #500 Km
		name = modern_ship_missil.galley.a50
		trigger = { 
			check_variable = {
				which = missil_50
				value = 10
			}
			event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
				sea_superregion = {
					any_province = {
						country_or_subject_holds = root
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							province_distance = {
								who = prev
								distance = 50
							}
						}
					}
					galleys_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = { 
						OR = {
							AND = {	
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 1
									}
								
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 2
									}
								}
								
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 2
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 2
								}

										}
									}

							value = 10
						}
					}

						sea_superregion = {
							any_province = {
								country_or_subject_holds = root
								has_building = mass_transit_system
								OR = {
									controlled_by = root
									controller = {
										is_subject_of = root
									}
								}

									province_distance = {
										who = prev
										distance = 50
									}
								}
							}

								heavy_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country

							}
						}
					}
				}

					limit = {
						sea_superregion = {	
							galleys_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
							
							NOT = {
								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 50
								}
							}

							}

					value = -10

									}

						}
					}
					OR = {
						event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = { 
							full_idea_group = defence_missil_research
						}
						event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
							overlord = { 
								full_idea_group = defence_missil_research
							}
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = { 
						check_variable = {
							which = missil_100
							value = 10
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
						sea_superregion = {
							any_province = {
								country_or_subject_holds = root
								has_building = mass_transit_system
								OR = {
									controlled_by = root
									controller = {
										is_subject_of = root
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									province_distance = {
										who = prev
										distance = 100
									}
								}
							}
							OR = {
								heavy_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
								galleys_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
							}
						}
					}
				}			
				random_province = {
					limit = {
						sea_superregion = {	
							galleys_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
							
							NOT = {
								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 100
								}
							}
						}
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
					}
					province_event = {
						id = they_cant_set_atom.26
					}
				}
				event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
					change_variable = {
						which = missil_50
						value = -10
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = missil_100
					value = -10
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = modern_ship_missil_10.9
				}
				event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
					set_variable = {
						which = missil_50
						value = 0
					}
					sea_superregion = {
						limit = {
							any_province = {
								country_or_subject_holds = root
								has_building = mass_transit_system
								OR = {
									controlled_by = root
									controller = {
										is_subject_of = root
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									province_distance = {
										who = prev
										distance = 100
									}
								}
							}
							galleys_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
						}
						kill_units = { who = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country type = galley amount = 8 }	
					}
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = missile_our_ship_g
					}
				}
				random_province = {
					limit = {
						sea_superregion = {	
							galleys_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
							
							NOT = {
								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 100
								}
							}
						}
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
						country_event = {
							id = they_cant_set_atom.270
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = missil_100
					value = -10
				}
			}
		}
		
	}

	option = { #Cancel
		name = modern_missil.1.cansel
		clr_global_flag = misile_ship_flag
		clear_global_event_target = missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = modern_ship_missil_10.3
	title = modern_ship_missil.trade_ship.t
	desc = modern_ship_missil_trade_ship.d
	picture = trade_ship_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes

	
	option = { #500 Km
		name = modern_ship_missil.light_ship.a50
		trigger = { 
			check_variable = {
				which = missil_50
				value = 10
			}
			event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
				sea_superregion = {
					any_province = {
						country_or_subject_holds = root
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							province_distance = {
								who = prev
								distance = 50
							}
						}
					}
					light_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = { 
						OR = {
							AND = {	
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 1
									}
								
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 2
									}
								}
								
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 2
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 2
								}

									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev

									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 3
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 3
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 4
									}
								}

									NOT = {

							any_province = {
								country_or_subject_holds = root
								has_building = mass_transit_system
								OR = {
									controlled_by = root
									controller = {
										is_subject_of = root

						}
					}

									distance = 50

					}

											which = attack_missile_lev

							}
						}
					}
					OR = {
						event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = { 
							full_idea_group = defence_missil_research
						}
						event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
							overlord = { 
								full_idea_group = defence_missil_research
							}
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = { 
						check_variable = {
							which = missil_50
							value = 10
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
						sea_superregion = {
							any_province = {
								country_or_subject_holds = root
								has_building = mass_transit_system
								OR = {
									controlled_by = root
									controller = {
										is_subject_of = root
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									province_distance = {
										who = prev
										distance = 100
									}
								}
							}
							OR = {
								heavy_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
								galleys_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
							}
						}
					}
				}			
				random_province = {
					limit = {
						sea_superregion = {	
							light_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
							
							NOT = {
								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 100
								}
							}
						}
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
						country_event = {
							id = they_cant_set_atom.36
						}
					}
				}
				event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
					change_variable = {
						which = missil_50
						value = -10
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = missil_100
					value = -10
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = modern_ship_missil_10.9
				}
				event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
					set_variable = {
						which = missil_50
						value = 0
					}
					sea_superregion = {
						limit = {
							any_province = {
								country_or_subject_holds = root
								has_building = mass_transit_system
								OR = {
									controlled_by = root
									controller = {
										is_subject_of = root
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									province_distance = {
										who = prev
										distance = 100
									}
								}
							}
							light_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
						}
						kill_units = { who = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country type = light_ship amount = 10 }	
					}
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = missile_our_ship_t
					}
				}
				random_province = {
					limit = {
						sea_superregion = {	
							light_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
							
							NOT = {
								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 100
								}
							}
						}
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
						country_event = {
							id = they_cant_set_atom.370
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = missil_100
					value = -10
				}
			}
		}
		
	}

	option = { #Cancel
		name = modern_missil.1.cansel
		clr_global_flag = misile_ship_flag
		clear_global_event_target = missil_ground_to_ship_target_country

country_event = {
	id = modern_ship_missil_10.4
	title = modern_ship_missil.transport.t
	desc = modern_ship_missil.transport.d
	picture = transport_ship_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes

	
	option = { #500 Km
		name = modern_ship_missil.transport.a50
		trigger = { 
			check_variable = {
				which = missil_50
				value = 10
			}
			event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
				sea_superregion = {
					any_province = {
						country_or_subject_holds = root
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							province_distance = {
								who = prev
								distance = 50
							}
						}
					}
					transports_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = { 
						OR = {
							AND = {	
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 1
									}
								
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 2
									}
								}
								
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 2
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 2
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 3
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 3
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 3
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev

									}
								}

							value = 10
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
						sea_superregion = {
							any_province = {
								country_or_subject_holds = root
								has_building = mass_transit_system
								OR = {
									controlled_by = root
									controller = {
										is_subject_of = root
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									province_distance = {
										who = prev
										distance = 50
									}
								}
							}
							OR = {
								heavy_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
								galleys_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
							}
						}
					}
				}			
				random_province = {
					limit = {
						sea_superregion = {	
							transports_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
							
							NOT = {
								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 50
								}
							}
						}
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {

							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}

							id = they_cant_set_atom.46
						}
					}
				}

						which = missil_50
						value = -10
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = missil_50
					value = -10
				}
			}

				country_event = {
					id = modern_ship_missil_10.9

						which = missil_50
						value = 0
					}
					sea_superregion = {
						limit = {
							any_province = {
								country_or_subject_holds = root

									}
								}

										who = prev
										distance = 50
									}
								}
							}
							transports_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
						}
						kill_units = { who = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country type = transport amount = 10 }	
					}
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = missile_our_ship_tr
					}
				}
				random_province = {
					limit = {

						}
					}
					OR = {
						event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = { 
							full_idea_group = defence_missil_research
						}
						event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
							overlord = { 
								full_idea_group = defence_missil_research
							}
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = { 
						check_variable = {
							which = missil_50
							value = 10
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
						sea_superregion = {
							any_province = {
								country_or_subject_holds = root
								has_building = mass_transit_system
								OR = {
									controlled_by = root
									controller = {
										is_subject_of = root
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									province_distance = {
										who = prev
										distance = 100
									}
								}
							}
							OR = {
								heavy_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
								galleys_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
							}
						}
					}
				}			
				random_province = {
					limit = {
						sea_superregion = {	
							transports_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
							
							NOT = {
								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 100
								}
							}
						}
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
						country_event = {
							id = they_cant_set_atom.46
						}
					}
				}
				event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
					change_variable = {
						which = missil_50
						value = -10
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = missil_100
					value = -10
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = modern_ship_missil_10.9
				}
				event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
					set_variable = {
						which = missil_50
						value = 0
					}
					sea_superregion = {
						limit = {
							any_province = {
								country_or_subject_holds = root
								has_building = mass_transit_system
								OR = {
									controlled_by = root
									controller = {
										is_subject_of = root
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									province_distance = {
										who = prev
										distance = 100
									}
								}
							}
							transports_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
						}
						kill_units = { who = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country type = transport amount = 10 }	
					}
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = missile_our_ship_tr
					}
				}
				random_province = {
					limit = {
						sea_superregion = {	
							transports_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
							
							NOT = {
								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 100
								}
							}
						}
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country = {
						country_event = {
							id = they_cant_set_atom.470
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = missil_100
					value = -10
				}
			}
		}
		
	}

########################################################################################################
#######################################
########################################################################################################


country_event = {
	id = modern_ship_missil_10.11
	title = modern_ship_missil.1.t
	desc = modern_ship_missil.1.d
	picture = target_ship_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { #heavy ship
		name = modern_ship_missil.heavyship.1
		trigger = {
			event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
				sea_superregion = {
					any_province = {
						country_or_subject_holds = root
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							province_distance = {
								who = prev
								distance = 100
							}
						}
					}
					heavy_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
				}
			}
		}		
		country_event = {
			id = modern_ship_missil_10.15
		}
		
	}
	option = { #heavy ship
		name = modern_ship_missil.galley.1
		trigger = {
			event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
				sea_superregion = {
					any_province = {
						country_or_subject_holds = root
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							province_distance = {
								who = prev
								distance = 100
							}
						}
					}
					galleys_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
				}
			}
		}		
		country_event = {
			id = modern_ship_missil_10.12
		}
		
	}
	option = { #transport
		name = modern_ship_missil.tradeship.1
		trigger = {
			event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
				sea_superregion = {
					any_province = {
						country_or_subject_holds = root
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							province_distance = {
								who = prev
								distance = 100
							}
						}
					}
					light_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
				}
			}
		}		
		country_event = {
			id = modern_ship_missil_10.13
		}
		
	}
	option = { #Major City
		name = modern_ship_missil.transporter.1
		trigger = { 
			event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
				sea_superregion = {
					any_province = {
						country_or_subject_holds = root
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							province_distance = {
								who = prev
								distance = 100
							}
						}
					}
					transports_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
				}
			}
		}
		country_event = {
			id = modern_ship_missil_10.14
		}
		
	}
	
	option = { #Cancel
		name = modern_missil.1.cansel
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = modern_ship_missil_10.15
	title = modern_ship_missil.heavy_ship.t
	desc = modern_ship_missil.heavy_ship.d
	picture = aircraft_carrier_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes

	
	option = { #500 Km
		name = modern_ship_missil.heavy_ship.a50
		trigger = { 
			check_variable = {
				which = missil_50
				value = 10
			}
				event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
					sea_superregion = {
						any_province = {
							country_or_subject_holds = root
							has_building = mass_transit_system
							OR = {
								controlled_by = root
								controller = {
									is_subject_of = root
								}
							}
							NOT = {
								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 50
								}
							}
						}
						heavy_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
					}
				}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = { 
						OR = {
							AND = {	
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 1
									}
								
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 2
									}
								}
								
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 2
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 2
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 3
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 3
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 3
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 4
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 4
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 4
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 5
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 5
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 5
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 6
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 6
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 6
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 7
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 7
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 7
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 8
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 8
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 8
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 9
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 9
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 9
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 10
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 10
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 10
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 11
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 11
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 11
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 12
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 12
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 12
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 13
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 13
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 13
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 14
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 14
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 14
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 15
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 15
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {

									}

					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = missile_our_ship_h
					}
				}

					limit = {

						}
					}
					
				}
				change_variable = {

					value = -10
				}
			}
		}

		name = modern_ship_missil.heavy_ship.a100
		trigger = {

										distance = 100
									}
								}
							}
							heavy_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
						}
						kill_units = { who = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 type = heavy_ship amount = 2 }	
					}
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = missile_our_ship_h
					}
				}
				random_province = {
					limit = {
						sea_superregion = {	
							heavy_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
							
							NOT = {
								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 100
								}
							}
						}
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
						country_event = {
							id = they_cant_set_atom.70
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = missil_100
					value = -10
				}
			}
		}

	option = { #Cancel
		name = modern_missil.1.cansel
		clr_global_flag = misile_ship_flag
		clear_global_event_target = missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = modern_ship_missil_10.12
	title = modern_ship_missil.galley.t
	desc = modern_ship_missil.galley.d
	picture = war_ship_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes

	
	option = { #500 Km
		name = modern_ship_missil.galley.a50
		trigger = { 
			check_variable = {
				which = missil_50
				value = 10
			}
			event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
				sea_superregion = {
					any_province = {
						country_or_subject_holds = root
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							province_distance = {
								who = prev
								distance = 50
							}
						}
					}
					galleys_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = { 
						OR = {
							AND = {	
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 1
									}
								
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 2
									}
								}
								
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 2
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 2
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 3
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 3
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 3
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 4
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 4
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 4
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 5
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 5
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 5
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 6
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 6
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 6
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 7
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 7
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 7
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 8
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 8
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 8
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 9
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 9
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 9
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 10
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 10
										}
									}
								}
							}

						}
					}
				}

						sea_superregion = {

					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = missile_our_ship_g
					}
				}
				random_province = {
					limit = {

							NOT = {

									who = prev
									distance = 50
								}
							}

							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
					}

							id = they_cant_set_atom.270
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = missil_50
					value = -10
				}
			}
		}
		
		
	}
	option = { #500 Km
		name = modern_ship_missil.galley.a100
		trigger = { 
			check_variable = {
				which = missil_100
				value = 10
			}
			event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
				sea_superregion = {
					any_province = {
						country_or_subject_holds = root
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							province_distance = {
								who = prev
								distance = 100
							}
						}
					}
					galleys_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
				}
			}
		}

						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
						sea_superregion = {
							any_province = {
								country_or_subject_holds = root
								has_building = mass_transit_system
								OR = {
									controlled_by = root
									controller = {
										is_subject_of = root
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									province_distance = {
										who = prev
										distance = 100
									}
								}
							}
							OR = {
								heavy_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
								galleys_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
							}
						}
					}
				}			
				random_province = {
					limit = {
						sea_superregion = {	
							galleys_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
							
							NOT = {
								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 100
								}
							}
						}
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
					}
					province_event = {
						id = they_cant_set_atom.26
					}
				}
				event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
					change_variable = {
						which = missil_50
						value = -10
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = missil_100
					value = -10
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = modern_ship_missil_10.9
				}
				event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
					set_variable = {
						which = missil_50
						value = 0
					}
					sea_superregion = {
						limit = {
							any_province = {
								country_or_subject_holds = root
								has_building = mass_transit_system
								OR = {
									controlled_by = root
									controller = {
										is_subject_of = root
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									province_distance = {
										who = prev
										distance = 100
									}
								}
							}
							galleys_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
						}
						kill_units = { who = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 type = galley amount = 8 }	
					}
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = missile_our_ship_g
					}
				}
				random_province = {
					limit = {
						sea_superregion = {	
							galleys_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
							
							NOT = {
								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 100
								}
							}
						}
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
						country_event = {
							id = they_cant_set_atom.270
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = missil_100
					value = -10
				}
			}
		}
		
		
	}

	option = { #Cancel
		name = modern_missil.1.cansel
		clr_global_flag = misile_ship_flag
		clear_global_event_target = missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = modern_ship_missil_10.13
	title = modern_ship_missil.trade_ship.t
	desc = modern_ship_missil_trade_ship.d
	picture = trade_ship_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes

	
	option = { #500 Km
		name = modern_ship_missil.light_ship.a50
		trigger = { 
			check_variable = {
				which = missil_50
				value = 10
			}
			event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
				sea_superregion = {
					any_province = {
						country_or_subject_holds = root
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							province_distance = {
								who = prev
								distance = 50
							}
						}
					}
					light_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = { 
						OR = {
							AND = {	
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 1
									}
								
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 2
									}
								}
								
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 2
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 2
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 3
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 3
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 3
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 4
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 4
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 4
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 5
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 5
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 5
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {

								has_building = mass_transit_system
								OR = {
									controlled_by = root
									controller = {
										is_subject_of = root
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									province_distance = {
										who = prev
										distance = 50
									}
								}
							}
							light_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
						}
						kill_units = { who = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 type = light_ship amount = 10 }	
					}
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = missile_our_ship_t
					}
				}
				random_province = {
					limit = {
						sea_superregion = {	
							light_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
							
							NOT = {
								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 50
								}
							}
						}
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
						country_event = {
							id = they_cant_set_atom.370
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = missil_50
					value = -10
				}
			}
		}

										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 98
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 98
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 98
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 99
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 99
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 99
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 100
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 100
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 100
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 101
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 101
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					OR = {
						event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = { 
							full_idea_group = defence_missil_research
						}
						event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
							overlord = { 
								full_idea_group = defence_missil_research
							}
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = { 
						check_variable = {
							which = missil_50
							value = 10
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
						sea_superregion = {
							any_province = {
								country_or_subject_holds = root
								has_building = mass_transit_system
								OR = {
									controlled_by = root
									controller = {
										is_subject_of = root
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									province_distance = {
										who = prev
										distance = 100
									}
								}
							}
							OR = {
								heavy_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
								galleys_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
							}
						}
					}
				}			
				random_province = {
					limit = {
						sea_superregion = {	
							light_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
							
							NOT = {
								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 100
								}
							}
						}
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
						country_event = {
							id = they_cant_set_atom.36
						}
					}
				}
				event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
					change_variable = {
						which = missil_50
						value = -10
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = missil_100
					value = -10
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = modern_ship_missil_10.9
				}
				event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
					set_variable = {
						which = missil_50
						value = 0
					}
					sea_superregion = {
						limit = {
							any_province = {
								country_or_subject_holds = root
								has_building = mass_transit_system
								OR = {
									controlled_by = root
									controller = {
										is_subject_of = root
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									province_distance = {
										who = prev
										distance = 100
									}
								}
							}
							light_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
						}
						kill_units = { who = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 type = light_ship amount = 10 }	
					}
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = missile_our_ship_t
					}
				}
				random_province = {
					limit = {
						sea_superregion = {	
							light_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
							
							NOT = {
								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 100
								}
							}
						}
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
						country_event = {
							id = they_cant_set_atom.370
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = missil_100
					value = -10
				}
			}
		}
		
	}

	option = { #Cancel
		name = modern_missil.1.cansel
		clr_global_flag = misile_ship_flag
		clear_global_event_target = missil_ground_to_ship_target_country
	}

country_event = {
	id = modern_ship_missil_10.14
	title = modern_ship_missil.transport.t
	desc = modern_ship_missil.transport.d
	picture = transport_ship_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes

	
	option = { #500 Km
		name = modern_ship_missil.transport.a50
		trigger = { 
			check_variable = {
				which = missil_50
				value = 10
			}
			event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
				sea_superregion = {
					any_province = {
						country_or_subject_holds = root
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
						NOT = {
							province_distance = {
								who = prev

					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = { 
						check_variable = {
							which = missil_50
							value = 10
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
						sea_superregion = {
							any_province = {
								country_or_subject_holds = root
								has_building = mass_transit_system
								OR = {
									controlled_by = root
									controller = {
										is_subject_of = root
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									province_distance = {
										who = prev
										distance = 50
									}
								}
							}
							OR = {
								heavy_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
								galleys_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
							}
						}
					}
				}			
				random_province = {
					limit = {
						sea_superregion = {	
							transports_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
							
							NOT = {
								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 50
								}
							}
						}
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
						country_event = {
							id = they_cant_set_atom.46
						}
					}
				}
				event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
					change_variable = {
						which = missil_50
						value = -10
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = missil_50
					value = -10
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = modern_ship_missil_10.9
				}
				event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
					set_variable = {
						which = missil_50
						value = 0
					}
					sea_superregion = {
						limit = {
							any_province = {
								country_or_subject_holds = root
								has_building = mass_transit_system
								OR = {
									controlled_by = root
									controller = {
										is_subject_of = root
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									province_distance = {
										who = prev
										distance = 50
									}
								}
							}
							transports_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
						}
						kill_units = { who = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 type = transport amount = 10 }	
					}
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = missile_our_ship_tr
					}
				}
				random_province = {
					limit = {
						sea_superregion = {	
							transports_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
							
							NOT = {
								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 50
								}
							}
						}
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
						country_event = {
							id = they_cant_set_atom.470
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = missil_50
					value = -10
				}
			}
		}

										value = 93
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 93
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 93
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 94
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 94
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 94
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 95
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 95
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 95
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 96
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 96
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 96
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 97
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 97
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 97
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 98
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 98
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 98
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 99
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 99
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 99
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 100
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 100
										}
									}
								}
							}
							AND = {	
								check_variable = {
									which = defense_missile_lev
									value = 100
								}
							
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = defense_missile_lev
										value = 101
									}
								}
								ROOT = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = attack_missile_lev
											value = 101
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					OR = {
						event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = { 
							full_idea_group = defence_missil_research
						}
						event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
							overlord = { 
								full_idea_group = defence_missil_research
							}
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = { 
						check_variable = {
							which = missil_50
							value = 10
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
						sea_superregion = {
							any_province = {
								country_or_subject_holds = root
								has_building = mass_transit_system
								OR = {
									controlled_by = root
									controller = {
										is_subject_of = root
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									province_distance = {
										who = prev
										distance = 100
									}
								}
							}
							OR = {
								heavy_ships_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
								galleys_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
							}
						}
					}
				}			
				random_province = {
					limit = {
						sea_superregion = {	
							transports_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
							
							NOT = {
								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 100
								}
							}
						}
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
						country_event = {
							id = they_cant_set_atom.46
						}
					}
				}
				event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
					change_variable = {
						which = missil_50
						value = -10
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = missil_100
					value = -10
				}
			}
			else = {
				country_event = {
					id = modern_ship_missil_10.9
				}
				event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
					set_variable = {
						which = missil_50
						value = 0
					}
					sea_superregion = {
						limit = {
							any_province = {
								country_or_subject_holds = root
								has_building = mass_transit_system
								OR = {
									controlled_by = root
									controller = {
										is_subject_of = root
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									province_distance = {
										who = prev
										distance = 100
									}
								}
							}
							transports_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
						}
						kill_units = { who = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 type = transport amount = 10 }	
					}
					add_opinion = {
						who = ROOT
						modifier = missile_our_ship_tr
					}
				}
				random_province = {
					limit = {
						sea_superregion = {	
							transports_in_province = event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1
							
							NOT = {
								province_distance = {
									who = prev
									distance = 100
								}
							}
						}
						has_building = mass_transit_system
						OR = {
							controlled_by = root
							controller = {
								is_subject_of = root
							}
						}
					}
					event_target:missil_ground_to_ship_target_country_1 = {
						country_event = {
							id = they_cant_set_atom.470
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = missil_100
					value = -10
				}
			}
		}
		
	}
